channel.title: Replacement on Thread Recap
channel.description: Recent content in Replacement on Thread Recap

item.title: October 2024
item.description: October 2024 LMAO extra time off only redeemable when SQ42 ships?! all of this crunch just for a “chapter one demo” to show at CitCon?! God damn CIG, you’ve really outdone yourself Thoatse When is Shitizencon? What do you mean? They con them every day. lol I’m sure he wasn’t just trying to get some pedantic game dad dorks to stop talking to him via the quickest route available to him “oh ahh yeah big things happening in Star Citizen, I’m totally still working for CIG sure, now excuse me I need to get into the weed dispensary.
